Name: Smashball
About the game: Smashball is a SciFi Sports game with some minor RPG features. Explore a vibrant city, talk to people and build relationships with them ... if you are lucky, even more. Roam around the city, and optimize yourself in order to pursue the universal dream of getting drafted by one of the eight Smashball teams. If you are good enough you will soon soar through the air, chasing opponents or dodging them in order to score goals and bring glory to your fanbase. Let's see if you and your team can make it to the biggest game and bring home the Galaxy Cup. The biggest trophy of them all. Play Smashball and find out which team chooses you to represent their district!
Meta Title: Smashball: Feb 21, 2022, Felix Albert and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Smashball? Check out the release date (Feb 21, 2022), developer insights from Felix Albert, and a complete game summary.
